question: Which tennis player has clinched the ATP Tour Finals 2020 in London?
explanation:
24-year-old Russian Tennis player Daniil Medvedev has clinched the ATP Finals 2020 in London, after beating US Open champion Dominic Thiem.
The young tennis player, who beat five-time champion Novak Djokovic and world number two Rafael Nadal earlier in the tournament, became the first man to beat all three of the world's top-ranked players at the season finale.
